short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabMemo: Transform new tabs into a sleek note-taking hub with markdown and themes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- 18 colour themes
- Ability to add 5 custom colour themes
- Light and dark modes
- 4 font families
- Ability to adjust font size
- 4 different font weights
- Add up to 3 time zones to keep track of time in different regions

Elevate your browsing experience with TabMemo, a polished Chrome extension that seamlessly transforms your new tab page into a refined note-taking sanctuary. Effortlessly capture ideas, organise thoughts, and stay productive without disrupting your online flow. TabMemo supports markdown formatting for a versatile and familiar note-taking environment, allowing you to personalise your workspace with a selection of meticulously crafted themes. Discover the perfect blend of productivity and elegance with TabMemo, where your every new tab becomes a canvas for organised inspiration.
